name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grand Theft Auto VI Live wallpapers

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring GTA VI vibes to Chrome with live wallpapers, plus a search bar and quick-access icons for fans of action-packed browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring GTA VI vibes to Chrome with live wallpapers, plus a search bar and quick-access icons for fans of action-packed browsing.

Step into the thrilling world of Grand Theft Auto VI with this Chrome extension, featuring high-energy live wallpapers inspired by the latest installment of GTA. Every new tab opens with immersive scenes from the vibrant streets, neon-lit skylines, and intense action sequences that define GTA VI. Perfect for fans of the series, this extension keeps you connected to the game’s signature mix of adventure, style, and high stakes.

Beyond the striking visuals, the extension includes a built-in Google search bar for effortless browsing and customizable quick-access icons to all your favorite sites. This way, you can stay productive while enjoying the electrifying energy of GTA VI in the background.

Whether you’re a longtime fan of Grand Theft Auto or excited for the latest release, the GTA VI Live Wallpaper extension brings a taste of the game’s world to your online experience. Open each new tab to feel the thrill of the city streets and the allure of GTA’s iconic atmosphere, keeping the adventure alive as you browse!
